A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Was given a solid layup by JJ Abrams in the previous film just to intentionally brick the shot and kill off everything people loved about Star Wars in addition to relegating the newly added character to 40 minutes of inconsequential fetch questing and virtue signaling.  Not looking forward to the next one and anyone who accuses \"haters\" of being racist/misogynistic should be ashamed all the way up to the point they plunk down $18.99 for a \"Porg Plushie\" at their local Disney Store.
